verses.verse: A Psalm <WH4210> of David, <WH1732> when he was in the wilderness <WH4057> of Judah. <WH3063> O God, <WH430> you are my God; <WH410> early <WH7836> will I seek <WH7836> you: my soul <WH5315> thirsts <WH6770> for you, my flesh <WH1320> longs <WH3642> for you in a dry <WH6723> and thirsty land, <WH776> where no <WH1097> water <WH4325> is;
To see <WH7200> your power <WH5797> and your glory, <WH3519> so <WH3651> as I have seen <WH2372> you in the sanctuary. <WH6944>
Because <WH3588> your loving kindness <WH2617> is better <WH2896> than <WH4480> life, <WH2416> my lips <WH8193> shall praise <WH7623> you.
Thus <WH3651> will I bless <WH1288> you while I live: <WH2416> I will lift <WH5375> up my hands <WH3709> in your name. <WH8034>
My soul <WH5315> shall be satisfied <WH7646> as with marrow <WH2459> and fatness; <WH1880> and my mouth <WH6310> shall praise <WH1984> you with joyful <WH7445> lips: <WH8193>
When <WH518> I remember <WH2142> you on my bed, <WH3326> and meditate <WH1897> on you in the night watches. <WH821>
Because <WH3588> you have been <WH1961> my help, <WH5833> therefore in the shadow <WH6738> of your wings <WH3671> will I rejoice. <WH7442>
My soul <WH5315> follows <WH1692> hard <WH1692> after <WH310> you: your right <WH3225> hand <WH3225> upholds <WH8551> me.
But those that seek <WH1245> my soul, <WH5315> to destroy <WH7722> it, shall go <WH935> into the lower <WH8482> parts of the earth. <WH776>
They shall fall <WH5064> by the sword: <WH2719> they shall be a portion <WH4521> for foxes. <WH7776>

But the king <WH4428> shall rejoice <WH8055> in God; <WH430> every <WH3605> one that swears <WH7650> by him shall glory: <WH1984> but the mouth <WH6310> of them that speak <WH1696> lies <WH8267> shall be stopped. <WH5534>
